item.name: All Request - Follow Order
item.description:
All the Requests are Arranged in a proper workflow. Please Execute them in order.

Order :

1. Add Multiple Vehicles - Fill Up Tables
2. AddVehicle (TODO 6.2) - Add Just Vehicle Entity Data not mapped Entities/Table.
3. AddVehicle - if want to add single vehicle for filling up data in tables.
4. GetVehicles (TODO 6.1) - get all Vehicles.
5. UpdateAvailabilityStatus(TODO 6.3) - Update Status by Admin
6. AddMultipleUsers - This is for filling up User Table for Booking up Vehicle.
7. BookingVehicle(TODO 6.4) -Book Vehicle
8. BookVehicleData - This is used when we want to Add Booking Entity data with mapped Entities.
9. GetAvailableVehicles - Based on Location , Date Pickup and DropOff (Extra)
10. AddUser - This is for testing of Signup Fnctionality.
    

Made with **`♥`** By Avtar Singh
